original_text: All the gold that was occupied for the work in all the work of the holy place, even the gold of the offering, was twenty and nine talents, and seven hundred and thirty shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary.
korean_text: 성소 건축 비용으로 들인 금은 성소의 세겔로 스물아홉 달란트와 칠백삼십 세겔이며

sentences.original_text: All the gold that was occupied for the work
sentences.korean_translation: 그 일을 위해 사용된 모든 금

sentences.original_text: in all the work of the holy place
even the gold of the offering
and seven hundred and thirty shekels
after the shekel of the sanctuary
